---
title: "Slides Redirect"
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
  warning: false
  error: false
  eval: false
---

<script>
  const slides = {
    "EDA1": "https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vXiVFaSsBIhlHjO_p1hXRefWfyRjFdsBXQVJslPyF_g/edit?slide=id.g3a19c45b4b0_1_5#slide=id.g3a19c45b4b0_1_5",
    "EDA2": "https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vXiVFaSsBIhlHjO_p1hXRefWfyRjFdsBXQVJslPyF_g/edit?slide=id.g33a550423b4_0_650#slide=id.g33a550423b4_0_650",
    "EDA3": "https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vXiVFaSsBIhlHjO_p1hXRefWfyRjFdsBXQVJslPyF_g/edit?slide=id.g33a550423b4_0_1438#slide=id.g33a550423b4_0_1438",
    "EVL1":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1GtvpOFBLJzXoIgXyQgwvJR5PDyIkhCuacD80LlGRHic/edit?slide=id.g323999f4ad1_0_263#slide=id.g323999f4ad1_0_263",
    "EVL2":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1GtvpOFBLJzXoIgXyQgwvJR5PDyIkhCuacD80LlGRHic/edit?slide=id.g32c0696979f_0_98#slide=id.g32c0696979f_0_98",
    "EVL3":"https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1GtvpOFBLJzXoIgXyQgwvJR5PDyIkhCuacD80LlGRHic/edit?slide=id.g32c0696979f_0_104#slide=id.g32c0696979f_0_104",
    "CLS1":"",
    "CLS2":"",
    "CLS3":"",
    "DATA1":"",
    "DATA2":"",
    "DATA3":"",
    "TREE1":"",
    "TREE2":"",
    "KNN":"",
    "LIN1":"",
    "LIN2":"",
    "SVM":"",
    "ENS1":"",
    "ENS2":"",
    "ENS3":"",
    "NN1":"",
    "NN2":"",
    "NN3":"",
    "DL1":"",
    "DL2":"",
    "DL3":""
  };

  const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
  const target = params.get("q");

  if (target && slides[target]) {
    window.location.href = slides[target];
  } else {
    document.write("<h2>Select a slide deck:</h2>");
    for (const key in slides) {
      document.write(`<p><a href="?q=${key}">${key} slides</a></p>`);
    }
  }
</script>
